Class mootcan.KillAllThread 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.Thread
           |
           +----mootcan.KillAllThread
class KillAllThread
extends Thread
a thread that deals with resizing and the browser leaving the applet. idea from JavaWorld, Java Tip 8: Threads, Netscape, and the resize problem

This class is not public and therefore cannot be used outside this package.
